paper_abstract: A novel data serializer is proposed for use in mobile TFT LCD driver ICs The proposed data serializer adopting hierarchical switching and repeater/separator schemes provides 82% power reduction and 27% speed improvement with 27% area saving Measured overall power consumption of a TFT LCD driver IC with the proposed data serializer was reduced by as much as 49%
paper_title: Low-Power High-Speed Data Serializer for Mobile TFT-LCD Driver ICs
